content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    julia_code_blocks = md.scan(/``` julia/))

    code_fences_removed = remove_code_fence(julia_code_blocks))

    joined_code_blocks = join_code_blocks(code_fences_removed))

    return "\n".join(joined_code_blocks))
end

function remove_code_fence(code_blocks)
    fence_removal_function = remove_code_fence_function
    fence_removal_function()
end

function remove_code_fence_function()
    function code_fence_removal_function(code_blocks)
        for block in code_blocks
            if start_index(block) > 0 && end_index(block) > 0
                block[end_index(block))] = block[start_index(block))]
            end
        end
        new_code_blocks = code_blocks
        for i in 1:length(new_code_blocks))
                if start_index(new_code_blocks)[i]]) > 0 &&
